title: Someone’s Last Day
raw_lyrics:
Someone yes someone’s last day
Some soul is drifting away
Their life is over on earth no more
For today is someone yes someone’s last day

This morning I gazed through the window so clear
I couldn’t help but shed, just one little tear
I knew that someone was drifting away
And I knew that today was someone’s last day
